name: M. M. Hashmi Sarker
bio:
I’m a fact-checker and journalist with five years of experience in digital journalism and multimedia reporting. I have graduated from Mass Communication and Journalism department of Comilla University. 
 I have spent the three years debunking nearly 800 pieces of misinformation using advanced verification and OSINT tools. My work focuses on accountability, context, and protecting the public’s right to accurate information.
